name: Big Bad Brawlers
description:
Gameplay Video

Description

In this wacky multiplayer 2D platform fighter, players battle it out by maneuvering around the stage and knocking their opponents off with varied attacks. Players can choose from three distinct characters: a mech-piloting cat, a skilled boxer, and a crudely drawn stick figure. Each of these characters will have different types of attacks that fit their general build and designated archetype. The game contains three different stages to choose from, each corresponding to a character’s respective “home world."

How To Play

While the game does support PS4 controllers, this is only for macOS, as currently the difference in input drivers between Windows and macOS cause irregular behavior for detecting controller inputs.
